mods.abstract: Saturday Pre-Opry Show, 1957-03-09, 6:00-6:30 pm, part 2. Recorded in Studio C at the National Life & Accident Insurance building. Personnel include Ott Devine (announcer), Roy Acuff (host, performer), Smoky Mountain Boys (performers), Kitty Wells (performer), Jimmy Riddle (performer), Johnnie & Jack (performers), Shot Jackson (performer), Gordon Terry (performer), Jerry Johnson (performer), Howdy Forrester (performer), and Bashful Brother Oswald (performer). Roy Acuff mentions the following program as featuring Ray Price and his Cherokee Cowboys, with announcer Dave Overton. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/531

subject.topic: National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.)
